name: The Unknown Depths
description:
The Unknown Depths

Will you uncover the mystery of the trench?

Play a short and simple Point and Click Underwater Horror adventure game
traverse through the different sections of the trench and find weird POIs.

Developer Notes (Please read)

This game is very buggy so if you find a POI and can't click on it, don't bother and just quit restart the game.

For a better experience, I recommend downloading the Game and playing it instead of playing it in the browser.

I haven't tested the WebGL version so if it doesn't work then that is to be expected.

(also the quit button doesn't work on WebGL, just refresh the page and the aspect ratio in the WebGL version is kinda wack.)

itch.io don't show screenshots if you have a playable game in the browser.

Made by

Emeep -   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGHbPdW3y-rl9YZP9tUFQpg               
(Video coming soon or maybe already came out depends on when you're viewing this)

Extra notes (read if you want to)

I have no idea how to make an actual story so this is my best effort of making a horror game. It's not that scary but I still hope you enjoy it.
